verses.verse: Behold <WH3068>, Jehovah maketh the earth<WH776> empty<WH1238>, and maketh it waste<WH1110>, and turneth<WH5753> it upside down<WH6440>, and scattereth abroad<WH6327> the inhabitants thereof<WH3427>.

The earth<WH776> shall be utterly<WH1238> emptied<WH1238>, and utterly<WH962> laid waste<WH962>; for Jehovah<WH3068> hath spoken<WH1696> this word<WH1697>.

The mirth<WH4885> of tabrets<WH8596> ceaseth<WH7673>, the noise<WH7588> of them that rejoice<WH5947> endeth<WH2308>, the joy<WH4885> of the harp<WH3658> ceaseth<WH7673>.
They shall not drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196> with a song<WH7892>; strong drink<WH7941> shall be bitter<WH4843> to them that drink it<WH8354>.
The waste<WH8414> city<WH7151> is broken down<WH7665>; every house<WH1004> is shut up<WH5462>, that no man may come in<WH935>.
There is a crying<WH6682> in the streets<WH2351> because of the wine<WH3196>; all joy<WH8057> is darkened<WH6150>, the mirth<WH4885> of the land<WH776> is gone<WH1540>.

For thus shall it be in the midst<WH7130> of the earth<WH776> among<WH8432> the peoples<WH5971>, as the shaking<WH5363> of an olive-tree<WH2132>, as the gleanings<WH5955> when the vintage<WH1210> is done<WH3615>.
These shall lift up<WH5375> their voice<WH6963>, they shall shout<WH7442>; for the majesty<WH1347> of Jehovah<WH3068> they cry aloud<WH6670> from the sea<WH3220>.

From the uttermost part<WH3671> of the earth<WH776> have we heard<WH8085> songs<WH2158>: Glory<WH6643> to the righteous<WH6662>. But I said<WH559>, I pine<WH7334> away<WH7334>, I pine away<WH188>, woe is me<WH898>! the treacherous have dealt treacherously<WH898>; yea<WH898>, the treacherous have dealt very<WH899> treacherously<WH898>.

The earth<WH776> shall stagger<WH5128> like a drunken<WH7910> man<WH5128>, and shall sway to and fro<WH5110> like a hammock<WH4412>; and the transgression<WH6588> thereof shall be heavy<WH3513> upon it<WH5307>, and it shall fall, and not rise<WH6965> again<WH3254>.
